statements: DELETE FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Terms of Service';
DELETE FROM legal_documents WHERE document_type = 'Contract' AND created_at < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE contract_id = 100 AND party1_name = 'Alice';
DELETE FROM agreements WHERE agreement_id = 200 AND party2_name = 'Bob';
DELETE FROM contracts WHERE client_id = 101 AND signing_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM agreements WHERE approval_date >= '2022-03-15' AND agreement_id = 201;
DELETE FROM agreements WHERE template_id = 2001 AND client_id = 3001;
